name: Wall of Ice
description: You create a wall of ice on a solid surface within range. You can form the wall as a flat surface up to 10 panels, each 10 feet by 10 feet, or as a dome or sphere with a radius of up to 10 feet. Each panel has AC 12 and 30 hit points. Breaking a panel creates a 10-foot-radius burst of cold, dealing 5d6 cold damage to creatures within range.
